channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street lamp not working again, 3rd February
item.description:
This street lamp has an ongoing issue of flashing on and off or flickering or just not working at all . Is it possible to fix it ? I have reported this problem before .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Tudor Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lazy., 3rd February
item.description:
Two bins - thats what they choose, to decide to drive an oversized van down this path. I have to question your Health and safety risk assessment driving on a public footpath with both People and dogs using the park. Is this really acceptable to rubbish up a footpath for shear laziness and being bone idle enough to not actually do a bit of manual work. Considering they sit in the van looking at their phones, I'd imagine they'd wanna stretch their legs! I can't upload the amount of photos I needed to. To show the damage of an already unkept path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurst Road, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unkempt Alley, 3rd February
item.description:
The alleyway behind shops and houses on Station Road accessed via Longlands Road needs attention. There is lots of rubbish both household and commercial which has lead to foxes and rats occupying the area. The foliage is overgrown pushing onto the fence of the adjacent property causing damage. In addition due to the above it makes it difficult for vehicles to see where the fence is and has resulted in multiple instance of the fence being driven into causing serious damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Longlands Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road flooding, 3rd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Longlands Road, Longlands, Greater London

item.title: Cupola Wood - Litter, 3rd February
item.description:
I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///dining.defend.kicked https://w3w.co/ dining.defend.kicked Lots of litter just within woodland, by gap from Rec, can the area be given a thorough litterpick please. Please can request be completed first time of asking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Way, Hayes, Greater London

item.title: Large pothole at road junction, 3rd February
item.description:
Has been there for months and apart from a temporary repair made on Sunday not effective action has been taken to date. My concerm is this temporary repair will soon fail, what we need is a more substantial repair and ideally some resurfacing, rather than patching repairs. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
